text: Stuart Rowley (born 12 May 1967) is a British engineer, and the head of Ford of Europe since April 2019.Ford April 2019 ==Early life== He was born in Derbyshire. He grew up in a Staffordshire village. He studied Mineral Engineering at the University of Leeds. ==Career== ===Ford=== He joined Ford of Britain in 1990. ==Personal life== He is married with two sons. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Alumni of the University of Leeds Category:British manufacturing chief executives Category:Ford of Europe Category:Ford executives Category:People from Staffordshire Category:Living people
title: Stuart Rowley
